definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc
Poland/Polish/abbr. for 波蘭|波兰[Bo1 lan2]

sentences.english: The influence of electromagnetic wave on biologic respiratory process is demonstrated by an experiment.
sentences.chinese: 本文用实验证实了电磁波对生物呼吸过程的影响。

sentences.english: Cold-test parameter is the premise of the beam and wave interaction calculation.
sentences.chinese: 行波管的冷参量是电磁波与电子注互作用计算的基础。

sentences.english: The angle of incidence may be complex for electromagnetic waves.
sentences.chinese: 对于电磁波来说它的入射角为复角。

sentences.english: Electromagnetic wave with wavelengths in 4000 Å is called UV.
sentences.chinese: 波长短于4000埃的电磁波则称为紫外光。

sentences.english: Till now, people have known very well about the interferences of the mechanical and electromagnetic waves.
sentences.chinese: 机械波与电磁波的干涉现象已为人们所熟知。

sentences.english: This range of wavelengths falls into the radio part of the electromagnetic spectrum.
sentences.chinese: 这个范围的波长落在电磁波谱上的无线电波段。

sentences.english: An accelerated charged particle radiates energy in the form of an electromagnetic wave.
sentences.chinese: 作加速运动的电荷会以电磁波的形式辐射能量。

sentences.english: One involved light, which was thought to be a smoothly oscillating electromagnetic wave.
sentences.chinese: 其中一个涉及到光，人们认为光是平稳振荡的电磁波。

sentences.english: The anomalies showed that the electromagnetic receiver can reflect earthquake precursors.
sentences.chinese: 这些异常进一步表明电磁波接收仪能反映地震前兆。

sentences.english: This is a detector of electromagnetic signals.
sentences.chinese: 这指示仪可用于检测电磁波信号。

sentences.english: The vector characteristics of electromagnetic wave are described with elliptic polarization parameters of the electromagnetic waves.
sentences.chinese: 电磁波的椭圆极化参数描述了电磁波的矢量特性。

sentences.english: The vector characteristics of electromagnetic wave are described with elliptic polarization parameters of the electromagnetic waves.
sentences.chinese: 电磁波的椭圆极化参数描述了电磁波的矢量特性。

sentences.english: The electromagnetic wave is produced by microwave tubes called klystrons.
sentences.chinese: 电磁波是由一种称为速调管的微波电子管产生的。

sentences.english: Multi-spectral sensors capture images at specific frequencies across the electromagnetic spectrum.
sentences.chinese: 多光谱传感器可以捕捉在特定频率的电磁波谱图像。

sentences.english: Rwaserican denting rear endocinearionr level sensors work on the principle of electromagnetic waudio-videoe transmission and reception.
sentences.chinese: 雷达物位传感器的处事原理是电磁波传输与收受。

sentences.english: Every body radiates heat in the form of electromagnetic waves .
sentences.chinese: 每一物体都以电磁波的形式辐射热。
